snippet: The head of the United Nations nuclear regulatory body urged Iran on Monday to permit access to a site near Tehran to ascertain whether nuclear bomb trigger tests have been carried out there.

byline.contributor: Michael R. Gordon contributed reporting from Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

lead_paragraph: The head of the United Nations nuclear regulatory body urged Iran on Monday to permit access to a site near Tehran to ascertain whether nuclear bomb trigger tests have been carried out there.

headline.seo: U.N. Nuclear Official Seeks Access to Iranian Site
headline.main: U.N. Nuclear Official Seeks Access to Iranian Site
headline.print_headline: U.N. Nuclear Official Seeks Access to Iranian Site
